name: Chaotic Crush
description:
Description

This game was made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2! The theme was "Let There Be Chaos".

Pursue your crush through a set of 6 mini-games encompassing classic arcade-y video games and a few wacky scenarios. However, it's not going to be so simple to convince your crush of your many charms. She's only into bad, chaotic kinda guys, which might prove a problem for you. You're going to have to prove yourself!

The twist of the game is that you are not required to beat the mini-games. Quite the opposite, you have to fail them in order to show your crush the kinda guy you are. Well, are you ready to give it a shot?

Controls

WASD - Movement
SPACE - Action Button
F - Toggle Full-screen
ESC - Exit Full-screen
M - Toggle Mute

Note

You might experience audio delay and/or distortions if you play the game in browser, if so please either mute the game with M or consider downloading the Windows version of the game where such problems should be non-existent.

You can toggle full-screen on and off with F, but it is not advisable to play the game at full-screen, since it wasn't built for it.
